page.title: 04Ecology of Evie
page.content: COAST:{Sea Pinks}grow in profusion as do{Sea Plantain}and{Sea Campion.} Here are also found{Cowslips,}very uncommon in Orkney. {Dunters}(Eider Ducks) nest in tall vegetation near the shore where{Turn {Stones}search for food. The inter- tidal zone provides good feeding for{ {Red Shanks}and{Oyster Catchers. Artic {Tern, Common Tern,}and{Sandwich Tern } fish for food. {Cormorants}and{Shags} dive for fish, while{Artic Skua}steal food from other birds. {Otters}are seen regularly in burns and the sea but more commonly come out at night. There is a Haul Out for 200 to 300{Common Seals. Dolphins}and {Porpoises}are spotted infrequently.
